const response = await client.reindex({
  source: {
    index: "my-index-000001",
    slice: {
      id: 0,
      max: 2,
    },
  },
  dest: {
    index: "my-new-index-000001",
  },
});
console.log(response);

  source: {
    index: "my-index-000001",
    slice: {
      id: 1,
      max: 2,
    },
  },
  dest: {
